page.title: 15 ANNUAL EVENTS
page.content: Every year there are two carnivals in the Summer.Local traders and organis- ations decorate floats that are pulled by lorries or tractors.There are prizes for the best floats and for the best fancy dress.There is a long proc- ession with bands playing in it.People throw money at the floats which goes to charity.Also in Summer,there is a tattoo on the Pier.Many bands take part and there is an air,sea rescue demonstration by the Lifeboat,Coast- guards and a helicopter from R.A.F Chivenor. On November 5th,the Round Table give a large firework display at Hillsborough and the money collected also goes to charity.At Christmas the main street is lit up and on Shrove Tuesday this same street has a pancake race going on.Our school has a Summer fete with stalls,games,a ghostwalk & pony rides.
